meanings.definition: A system of electronic funds transfer used in banking.
meanings.sent1: I used giros to send money to my family overseas.
meanings.sent2: The bank offers giros as a convenient way to transfer funds.
meanings.sent3: The giros danced through the digital network, carrying my payment safely.
meanings.sent4: The giros of data moved swiftly and securely between accounts.
meanings.sent5: The concept of giros made sending money across the world seem effortless.

meanings.definition: A type of dance originating in Argentina.
meanings.sent1: The dancers performed graceful giros on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: In tango, the giro is a fundamental move that showcases skill.
meanings.sent3: The giro twirled elegantly, captivating the audience with its beauty.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were like a giro, spinning and turning with precision.
meanings.sent5: The giro added a touch of passion and flair to the performance.

meanings.definition: A type of sandwich made with a flatbread.
meanings.sent1: For lunch, I ordered a delicious giro filled with veggies.
meanings.sent2: The food truck serves tasty giros with various fillings.
meanings.sent3: As I bit into the giro, the flavors melded together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The giro was a delightful combination of textures and tastes.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly made giro made my mouth water.
